        return txt
    
    # Week 1

    # Week 2
    txt = re.sub(PATTERNS[1], change, txt)

        # Replace double letters

        # Week 4
        txt = re.sub(PATTERNS[3], change, txt)

        # Week 5
        txt = re.sub(PATTERNS[4], change, txt)

    return txt

    if week < 5:
        return txt

    # Week 5

    return txt

def siegfried(week, txt):
    if week < 1 or week > 5:
        return txt
    
    # Week 1
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ci|ce|c(?!h)', change, txt)
    
    if week < 2:
        return txt
    
    # Week 2
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ph', change, txt)
    
    if week < 3:
        return txt
    
    # Week 3
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)(?<!\b[a-z]{1})(?<!\b[a-z]{2})e\b', '', txt)
    txt = re.sub(r'(.)\1', r'\1', txt)  # Replace double letters
    
    if week < 4:
        return txt
    
    # Week 4
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)th|w[rh]?', change, txt)
    
    if week < 5:
        return txt
    
    # Week 5
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', change, txt)
    
    return txt

    if week < 1 or week > 5:

        (r'ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', 5)

    for i, (pattern, week_num) in enumerate(rules):
        if week >= week_num:
            txt = re.sub(pattern, change, txt, flags=re.IGNORECASE)

    return txt

    ]

        {"ou": "u", "an": "un", "ing": "ink", "sm": "schm"}
    ]

def siegfried(week, txt):
    if week < 1:
        return txt
    
    # Week 1
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ci|ce|c(?!h)', lambda m: CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()].capitalize() if m.group(0)[0].isupper() else CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()], txt)
    
    if week < 2:
        return txt
    
    # Week 2
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ph', lambda m: CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()].capitalize() if m.group(0)[0].isupper() else CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()], txt)
    
    if week < 3:
        return txt
    
    # Week 3
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)(?<!\b[a-z]{1})(?<!\b[a-z]{2})e\b', '', txt)  # Remove trailing e for 2 and 3 letter words
    txt = re.sub(r'([a-z])\1', lambda m: m.group(1), txt)  # Replace double letters with single letters
    
    if week < 4:
        return txt
    
    # Week 4
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)th|w[rh]?', lambda m: CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()].capitalize() if m.group(0)[0].isupper() else CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()], txt)
    
    if week < 5:
        return txt
    
    # Week 5
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', lambda m: CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()].capitalize() if m.group(0)[0].isupper() else CHANGES[m.group(0).lower()], txt)
    
    return txt

def siegfried(week, txt):
    if week < 1 or week > 5:
        return txt

    patterns = [
        re.compile(r'ci|ce|c(?!h)', re.IGNORECASE),
        re.compile(r'ph', re.IGNORECASE),
        re.compile(r'(?<!\b[a-z]{1})(?<!\b[a-z]{2})e\b|([a-z])\1', re.IGNORECASE),
        re.compile(r'th|wr|wh|w', re.IGNORECASE),
        re.compile(r'ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', re.IGNORECASE)
    ]
    
    def change(m):
        tok = m.group(0)
        rep = CHANGES.get(tok.lower(), "" if None in m.groups() else m.group()[0])
        if tok[0].isupper(): 
            rep = rep.title()
        return rep

    for i in range(week):
        txt = patterns[i].sub(change, txt)

    return txt

    if week < 2:
        return txt

    # Week 2
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ph', change, txt)

    if week < 3:
        return txt

    # Week 3
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)(?<!\b[a-z]{1})(?<!\b[a-z]{2})e\b', '', txt)
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)([a-z])\1', r'\1', txt)

    if week < 4:
        return txt

    # Week 4
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)th|w[rh]?', change, txt)

    if week < 5:
        return txt

    # Week 5
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', change, txt)

    return txt

def siegfried(week, txt):
    if week < 1 or week > 5:
        return txt
    
    # Apply Week 1 rules
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ci|ce|c(?!h)', change, txt)
    
    if week < 2:
        return txt
    
    # Apply Week 2 rules
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ph', change, txt)
    
    if week < 3:
        return txt
    
    # Apply Week 3 rules
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)(?<!\b[a-z]{1})(?<!\b[a-z]{2})e\b', '', txt)  # remove trailing e
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)([a-z])\1', r'\1', txt)  # replace double letters with single letters

    if week < 4:
        return txt

    # Apply Week 4 rules
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)th|w[rh]?', change, txt)
    
    if week < 5:
        return txt

    # Apply Week 5 rules
    txt = re.sub(r'(?i)ou|an|ing\b|\bsm', change, txt)
    
    return txt
